I recently visited Pasta Papa and it was an outstanding experience! The food was flavorful and beautifully presented, showcasing smoked duck agilo oilo, carbonara and crab meat risotto, that were cooked to perfection. Each bite reflected quality ingredients and careful preparation.

The service was equally impressive. The staff were attentive, friendly, and efficient, ensuring we felt welcomed throughout our visit. They anticipated our needs without being intrusive and were knowledgeable about the menu.

Overall, Pasta Papa exceeded my expectations with its exceptional food and warm service. I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a memorable dining experience.

Interestingly, it was located in an isolated sports complex,  which I didn't even know existed.

The food was tasty, except for the Vongole. My colleague said that the pasta was undercooked and could still taste the raw flour taste, she couldnt taste any white wine, and there was not enough sauce. Also, we felt that the price was a tad bit high in a non air-con cafe.

But the staff does make every effort to answer your enquiry and serve fast, despite the lack of manpower.

Last note, as of Apr 2025, there is no card payment nor paywave except via qr code scanning (PayLah or Paynow)
